case_circumstances: Decedent found amongst bushes in desert area within the Tohono O'Odham Reservation.  He was found in the vicinity of two other deceased males (UP#: 10498 and UP#:10331).  Fingerprints for this individual match to a 2006 Border Patrol apprehension in which the decedent provided to USBP the name "Manuel Ortiz" and a birthdate of 17 August 1986.  Guatemalan Nationality is suspected, however the Consulate was unable to locate any next of kin.  AAA
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
